wackyThings.name: 1500 Live Ladybugs
wackyThings.details: Includes a Ladybug educational sheet with Release Tips, Release Rates, Ladybug Fun Facts and FAQ's

wackyThings.name: Home Mushroom Farm
wackyThings.details: Now you can grow your own fungus right at home—and not in between your toes!

wackyThings.name: Human Finger
wackyThings.details: That's right: you can buy human fingers on Amazon! The perfect gift for the science teacher in your life—or the kid you need to start hiding the scissors from.

wackyThings.name: Bacon Scented Mustache
wackyThings.details: Now you can smell bacon all day in peace, its scent hidden in an inconspicuous piece of facial hair. Sure beats rubbing pig fat on your upper lip.

wackyThings.name: Godzilla Garden Gnome
wackyThings.details: Let those pesky, roving neighborhood gnomes know where they're not welcome. (A series of big-budget, narratively lackluster sequels not included.)
